title: Remarks on piecewise-linear algebra
contributors: The Pennsylvania State University CiteSeerX Archives
abstract: This note studies some of the basic properties of the category whose objects are finite unions of (open and closed) polyhedra and whose morphisms are (not necessarily continu-ous) piecewise-linear maps.
